TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AddressFamily extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the addressing scheme that an instance of the class can use.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily> member specifies the addressing scheme that a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> will use to resolve an address. For example, InterNetwork indicates that an IP version 4 address is expected when a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> connects to an endpoint.
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> using the InterNetwork <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>.
[!code-cpp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/VB/source.vb#1)]
